attributes.action: force companies to make up S.S.P to a basic weekly average wage as SSP is really pathetic in this day and age.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if people are genuinely ill or off through no fault of their own i do not beleive that they should not have increased pressure to return to work because of financial pressures.if a company says that such a system is financially unviable the government should set up an insurance scheme that could be claimed from
